widget.name: Mahara Mobile
widget.description:
Android uploader for Mahara, the open-source ePortfolio. MaharaDroid enables Android phones to share or upload content to a Mahara site. It allows you to: - upload photos from your phone - create journal entries on your phone - receive your Mahara notifications on your phone - create Mahara content while offline, and schedule it to upload automatically at a later time
MaharaDroid is an open-source project. To contribute or report bugs, see https://github.com/holloway/mahara-mobile
widget.author: Maraha Mobile by Catalyst IT
